title: Fragments And Shards: A Collection Of Horrors
features: Monsters, demons, ghosts, killers, the supernatural, evil, dread, nightmares, and the inescapable grip of fate... these are some of the terrors found inside this wonderful collection of horror stories. Take a trip to where only the dark imagination can take you...
description: Michael Yowell (1969 - ) was born in Denver, Colorado, and lived in Colorado for 46 years before relocating to Columbia, South Carolina. His stories have been published in e-zines and print anthologies (WRITING SHIFT, SANITARIUM, and THIRTEEN). His works include the haunted house novel DEVILHOUSE, his collection of short horror stories FRAGMENTS AND SHARDS, the creepy killer and anchorwoman novel THE CAMERA EYE, the werewolf hunter novels THE DOGCATCHER and THE DOGCATCHER II: CHUPACABRAS, the sea monsters novels SLIGGERS and SLIGGER ISLAND, and his epic Western (yes, Western) RED PINES.
